ROW.Title: Petition for the reparation of the island's dock
ROW.Fondo: Procuratori di San Marco, De Supra
ROW.Synopsis: The Cassier of the Senate ascertains that the dock needs urgent repair. He reminds the Senate decree (17 May 1726) that authorized the Regimento dell'Arsenal to provide the friars with materials for the reconstruction. He asked for a renewal of the former concession.
